Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Rhino Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Rhino Transport is a stalwart workhorse symbolizing the practical might of the Imperium in the harsh 41st millennium. With a utilitarian and robust design, it wears weathered plating adorned with Imperial iconography, showcasing tales of unyielding service and reliability in the ongoing war.

This armored transport's no-nonsense aesthetic reflects the harsh and pragmatic nature of Imperium warfare. Purpose-built for troop transport, the Rhino symbolizes battlefield logistics, ensuring the safe deployment of Imperial forces with its sturdy chassis acting as a mobile fortress against relentless opposition.

Traversing war-scarred terrain, the Rhino Transport stands as a steadfast symbol of Imperium resilience, navigating the darkness of GrimWorld 40,000 with determination to fulfill its crucial role in the Emperor's grand strategy. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x10
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
